name: places/ChIJpYgFyd5ZwokRVNLuCJpMpiE
adrFormatAddress: 1324 2nd Ave #2, New York, NY 10021-5408, USA

originalText.text: 5-star service!  Sally was very informative on the best way to care for my hair, including product recommendations for my specific concerns. She took her time on my Keratin treatment, and the results were the best I’ve ever received. Sally also uses all high-quality products and she seriously gave me one of my best haircuts I’ve ever had, doing exactly what I had asked for. Everyone was so friendly and ready to help. I’m so happy & relieved to have finally found my new hair salon. A true diamond in NYC

originalText.text: Loggia is absolutely the most professional and talented hairstylist I have ever been to ! Her salon is lovely and welcoming, and I always feel well taken care of by her staff ( Jimmy you rock!). I recently decided I wanted a change, and showed Loggia a pic of highlights I was thinking of. She knocked it out of the park with my color and cut! And then John gave me an amazing blowout and some fabulous waves.. I swear I left there feeling like a movie star! Highly recommend Loggia and her salon!

originalText.text:
This is my best place to have my hair done . Logia is very knowledgeable. Patient., kind . Fun , and attentive  when she is doing your hair .The salon is absolutely beautiful, very welcome
Is a good ambiance. I always recommend this salon to anyone . Just take a look at my hair :))) with the special keratine treatment she did on my hair today. I love my hair the way it looks . Thank you logia

originalText.text: Had a wonderful experience here for the first time haircut and balayage. I booked in with the owner Loggia and she was so attentive and listened to exactly what I wanted.  The result is beautiful.  The salon is relaxing and has a beautful ambiance. More than 5 stars!

text.text: Had a wonderful experience here for the first time haircut and balayage. I booked in with the owner Loggia and she was so attentive and listened to exactly what I wanted.  The result is beautiful.  The salon is relaxing and has a beautful ambiance. More than 5 stars!

originalText.text:
I am so pleased to say that I have been  a client of Sally’s for over twenty years.  Sally is a true artist with regards to her coloring and styling techniques.  She has a very strong understanding of different types and textures of hair and is able to apply her knowledge to best serve her clients. She is also up-to-date on the latest trends and new products. It is so reassuring knowing that Sally will always give me the best color and cut that enhance my hair and style.

In addition to being a great stylist, Sally is a very warm and caring person who only wants the best for her clients.  Nothing gives her more satisfaction than seeing her clients happy with the beautiful results of her work.

I am so grateful to Sally for all of her support over these past two decades!!!
